scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.serve: npm run clean && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.serve:prod: npm run clean && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css" "bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload"
